title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing one’s forehead in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the forehead in a dream by Ibn Sirin, as it is known that the forehead is one of the most important parts of the human face and is considered an adornment for the person, and seeing it in a dream includes many interpretations and connotations. They are considered positive, and are often beneficial to the seer, and their difference depends on the condition of the fortuneteller, and here there are many interpretation scholars, including Ibn Sirin, who explained these signs, and here we will get to know you. About the interpretation of the dream of seeing the forehead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of seeing the forehead in a dream by Ibn Sirin is a dream that many people consider strange, but it is a reality that includes several interpretations, connotations and meanings, especially since they differ from one person to another, and during this paragraph we will explain to you. The interpretation of dreams of seeing the forehead In a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is: According to what the scholar Ibn Sirin said: The forehead is prominent and prominent; Because it is a place of worship. In addition, it can refer to a boy. Whereas if one sees in a dream the effect of lying down. This is evidence of the increase of religion and piety and its spread among people. They also said that whoever sees in his dream that his forehead has been injured. The bad man he hates is sufficient for him. Otherwise, it would be a lack of money. But if he sees in his dream that his forehead is injured or has ulcers or something that he denies while he is awake, then he knocks during his prayer and does not complete his prostration and is confronted with foolish words. But if a person sees in a dream that the color of the forehead is what he hates, it is evidence of... That he will become indebted, and if his color changes after germination, he will pay off those debts. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a human being turning into an animal in a dream. Interpretation of seeing his wide forehead in a dream. There are many of those dreams related to the forehead that we see in a dream, and they differ from each other in the associations and meanings they contain. , which many scholars and experts in dream interpretation were keen to clarify, and in this paragraph we will learn more about it. The interpretation of seeing a wide forehead in a dream is also: Mostly, scholars believe that the interpretation of a dream with a wide forehead seems good. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that one has a wide forehead in a dream. It is an indication that her God is generous and generous. In addition, this vision can carry a sign that the one who dreams of it is a person who brings problems and difficulties. But if a person sees in his dream that his forehead expands, then it is considered one of the visions that is not considered a good sign. It will be A sign that the fortuneteller will lose his mind or may go crazy. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that his forehead is narrowing. This vision is a sign that the dreamer will lose his morals and bad reputation among people. Also, if one sees in a dream that the forehead is wide and white. It is a sign that The dreamer is an intelligent and kind-hearted person. See also: Interpretation of a dream of shaving someone else’s hair by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of seeing the mark of a lie on the forehead. These interpretations and the connotations that this dream carries for many people differ, as they differ from one person to another, based on their social status, and in this paragraph we will learn more The interpretation of the dream of seeing the mark of lying on the forehead is also: If a person sees in a dream a sign of prayer appearing on his forehead. This indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft from relatives. Many interpreters have tried to explain the dreams of jinn, their demonic possessions, and the actions they take. Among these is the jurisprudence of Fasir, the dream about witchcraft from relatives. In general, they explained that seeing this dream in a dream is evidence of the presence of very bad things in the dreamer’s life. Also, seeing Relatives in a dream about witchcraft indicate that there are many relatives among whom there are personal differences. Between them and that person who sees the dream is considered evidence of the disintegration of the family. A dream about witchcraft in a dream also indicates many sins in which this dreamer indulges. And many of the evils and sins that he committed. In his life and he still has to repent. The dreamer’s evil ways are what make him see these dreams because of the bad things that happen in his subconscious mind and follow his desires for temptation. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing magic and decoding it in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of a dream about magic from relatives in a dream for a single womanFrom the cases The one in whom she sees a dream about witchcraft from relatives in a dream is an unmarried girl. Interpreters have come up with many interpretations, and some of these interpretations and opinions can be presented in the following points. Seeing a single girl in her dream about witchcraft from relatives. It indicates the presence of a devious, cunning person in her life. And deceitful. Also, seeing magic in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her disobedience in her life. And after her religion and worship, which she is supposed to perform in order to fulfill the conditions of faith. It is the best indication of the scandalous actions that she performs and forbidden actions. And seeing it in a dream is the magic of one of his relatives. Meaning. She is surrounded by a large number of unjust relatives, who are vile and lie and ignore her. Sometimes magic in a single woman’s dream is a sign of a lack of faith and also shows her inability to manage her life. Magic, especially from relatives, is an indicator of the problems that fill the lives of single people. Interpretation Dream of witchcraft by relatives in a married woman’s dream. A married woman may also see witchcraft in her dream. We tell about these dreams. Dream of witchcraft by relatives as follows: If a married woman sees in her sleep a dream of witchcraft and it is from relatives. It will be the best evidence of the deception and hypocrisy that fills her life. Those around her. It is a sign of lying and family quarrels between her and her husband because of relatives. Also, dreaming about witchcraft from one of the relatives in a married woman’s dream is evidence of that. The presence of one of these relatives causes many problems. This person wishes evil for this married woman and wants to divorce her from her husband. A dream about magic in a married woman’s dream indicates the existence of bad marital relations between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives in a divorced woman’s dream. As for the appearance of a dream about magic from a relative in a divorced woman’s dream, this indicates the following: Seeing absolute magic from relatives is a sign of change in relationships. The family relationship between her, her children, and her ex-husband. The dream of magic in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the emergence of many social problems and the emergence of a lack of money. The dream of magic in the dream of a married woman

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Qasas in a dream. Secrets of interpreting surahs of the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Surat Al-Qasas in a dream, secrets of interpreting surahs of the Qur’an in a dream. The Holy Qur’an is one of the blessings of God Almighty that He gave to Muslims and which He revealed to Gabriel thereby. Muslims have a book that explains everything that is permissible and what is forbidden in the Islamic religion, and people’s knowledge of the Islamic religion, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of Surat Al-Qasas in a dream. The secrets of interpreting surahs of the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Qasas in a dreamReading Surat Al-Qasas in a dream It is a good dream that indicates that God Almighty will provide the dreamer with many good legal rulings and that his circumstances will change for the better because of this money. Some interpreters say that seeing Surat Al-Qasas in a dream is a good dream, indicating that the dreamer is seeking knowledge, and that God Almighty is directing him to knowledge. The beneficial and correct understanding that benefits him and his religion. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Insan in a dreamSurat Al-Insan is one of the good surahs that it is good to see in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Insan, or someone else is reading it for him, then this dream means that the dreamer is always ready to give alms. To please God Almighty. He said: It means that the fortuneteller has good morals and a good reputation among the people he deals with in his life. Among the interpretations given in the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer is one of those who enjoy great generosity, influence others within him and satisfy their needs, even if he is the one in need. To whomever helps him. Some interpreters said that this dream means that the dreamer will have great fame among the people and that God Almighty will grant him a decent life. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream There are many interpretations of seeing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream, which are: Whoever reads Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream, this dream indicates that The dreamer is one of those who fear God Almighty in their lives and want to follow the truth and stay away from lies and desires. Among the interpretations that came to this dream is that the dreamer who sees this vision feels intense envy and hatred towards his family and that this dream is a message to him to stop wishing people a good death and desires that. Obedience to God Almighty, and purifying his heart from grudges and hatred. Among the good interpretations of seeing this Surah in a dream, commentators say that this vision means that the dreamer will be protected by God Almighty from the torment of the grave. It was said in its interpretation that the dreamer is trying to repent from the sins and disobedience that he commits, and that God Almighty will give him Sincere and sincere repentance, and that he loves those who do good deeds and always wants to get closer. For them.Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in dreams. Some interpreters say that seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream is a bad dream, as it indicates that the dreamer will be harmed by a woman, which will harm his body or money, and this is a bad thing. It will make him feel sad and remorseful. He said: It means that the dreamer avoids approaching forbidden things and wants to stay away from them as much as possible. Among the sayings contained in the meaning of her vision are those who say harmful things about him behind his back, and that he will see these sayings and knowing them will cause him pain and psychological distress. There are some interpretations. Which she says she is

title: Stealing shoes in a dream for single, married and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail

preview.html: Stealing shoes in a dream for single, married or divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail. A human being has a set of basic needs, which are food, drink, clothing, and shelter. These needs cannot be freed from at all in order to meet these needs. Among the needs that have become among the basic needs in our time are shoes. Which is depicted as something worn on the feet to protect them from the streets and keep them in place for as long as possible. Seeing shoes in a dream is one of the strangest things, and the strangest of them is seeing oneself in a dream stealing shoes. For this reason, many people want to obtain all the information on the subject of the answer to stealing shoes in a dream for single, married, and divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail, followed by the interpretation of the dream. Seeing shoes being stolen in a dream for a single woman: Theft is presented as one of the undesirable things that happen, and the Islamic religion has commanded us to stay away from it, and whoever commits it will be held accountable, and seeing theft in a dream is strange. Interpretation of seeing stolen shoes in a dream could come to an unmarried woman, as a loss For many ambitions from the dreamer that he seeks to achieve in her life. Dream interpretation scholars unanimously agreed that seeing stolen shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of bad luck that will be the girl’s ally in the coming days of her life. It is an indication that the single girl has a large group of The backward people in her life who are trying to push her to follow paths other than the paths in which she grew up and grew up. The girl who dreams that she is unmarried and belongs to one of the educational stages and sees in her dream that she is stealing shoes. The interpretation of this dream comes as an indication that the girl is wasting her time on useless things and her time is declining. Her education rate. Than it was. And if the shoes that you steal are worn, then the interpretation of this dream is interpreted as a sign of bad luck, and negative transformations that will follow her in the next period of her life. And if anyone worked in a professional organization and saw that she stole shoes, then this dream indicates a problem A large business in her organization. See also: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful baby girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its most important indications for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes and looking for them for a married woman. Shoes are one of the important and necessary things that every person, male or female, should own, because they are necessary at the moment they think about them. One is at the checkout, outside one's own home, and then all the relevant information. On the topic of the answer regarding the interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes and looking for them for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes and searching for them for a married woman, as an indication of the emergence of a group of negative changes that will occur in her life. And for a married woman who sees in her dream that there is a woman stealing her husband’s shoes, the interpretation of this comes: The dream is that a girl is trying to get close to her husband and take him from her, and she must be very careful with every woman who enters her life. Stealing worn-out shoes in a dream is evidence of the emergence of marital problems.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a well for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a well in a dream for single and married women. A well is a hole deep in the ground from which water is extracted, as well as oil and natural gas. Since you see a well in a dream, it has many different interpretations and connections between them, and because some of them fear this because of the darkness and depth, and through this article we will learn about it. On the interpretation of a dream about a well for single and married people. The woman and all the various interpretations and indicators that relate to this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a well with excess water. An unmarried woman may dream of a well with excess water or dream of others, such as a married woman or a man who works hard to find a new job that will provide him with a decent life. This dream indicates marriage if it is for single people. Or to find a new source of livelihood for the married woman or man who works hard to provide him with enough money in this life that has become very difficult and requires the person to work harder than he was in life. In the past to secure what is needed, a dream of a well of surplus water indicates abundant food and money, and a well of surplus water is the dream of every person who is lost in the desert searching for water. For evil. See also: Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a well filled with water. By knowing the interpretation of a dream about a well full of water, many people will be able to know the situation in which they live or that they will face in the coming days, and since this dream has many Interpretations and indicators, which are as follows: To dream of filling people with water indicates the abundance of sustenance and money that can be obtained from a new business or trade that will succeed. He will gain God's satisfaction and success in his work. In the end, dreaming of a well filled with water indicates success in work or any interest one undertakes, whether the dream is for a single man, a married woman, or any other person who sees a dream of a well in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a well in a dream may indicate However, you will face some obstacles in the future, which are major concerns for you because they may harm your social or financial life, because the well is one of the dark and scary places, according to Ibn. . Sirin, who is famous for interpreting dreams, and her interpretation is as follows: Dream interpretation books stated that seeing a well in a dream is described as dark, without water, and with an extremely infinite depth, indicating illness or loss, but this rarely indicates that while seeing a well in a dream is for unmarried people. It may indicate goodness and marriage, especially since the well is a source of goodness and livelihood for a person in his natural state. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a falling chandelier and ceiling chandeliers in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling into a well. This dream in which a child is seen falling into a well in a dream is one of the dreams that does not bode well. Good in most cases and the interpretations and indicators related to it are as follows: Since a child falling into a well indicates loss, loss, or even illness, it is important for a person to work and strive to protect his money, property, and family members from any harm or

On the interpretation of a dream about a well for single and married people. The woman and all the various interpretations and indicators that relate to this dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of another person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from someone else. Seeing blood in a dream is a scary dream that causes a lot of stress and tension for the dreamer. You may be interested in meeting the dead father in a dream. But there is no need to worry because this dream may be good sometimes, and we will explain this in detail. In the case of a married woman who sees blood bleeding from her feet in a dream. This indicates an abundance of sustenance and kindness, and an improvement in the husband's financial condition. If you see someone you know, blood is bleeding. This shows the many problems and difficulties that you face, but you will get rid of them, God knows best. And when you see blood bleeding from someone's hand in a dream. This indicates that she has problems, but they will be solved soon without harm. And when you see blood bleeding from her hand in a dream. This indicates exposure to disappointments, but he will overcome them. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from someone else Many people are looking for an interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from someone else. If a person sees in his dream that he is offering blood to someone else, this indicates that this person needs help and that others extend a helping hand to him, because he always feels inferior. God knows best. But if this person offers his blood to A person who knows him well and is close to him, then these two people will have a relationship in reality and a relationship full of love, affection and intimacy will arise between them. This vision may indicate bad things, as the man may lose his job and be forced to look for another job to help cover his expenses. And if a person is actually suffering from a certain illness and sees in his dream blood coming out of another person, this is a sign that he will recover soon and in good health, God Almighty willing, and God knows best. . Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person to one person Seeing this dream for an unmarried girl has many connotations and many meanings, which we will explain below: It is true that the single girl who sees blood flowing from another person in her dream is an unpleasant vision at all, but there should be no fear and tension, she will have a good time, God willing. God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone is bleeding and a large amount of blood is coming out and he is the one who was cut, this means that this girl will face many problems and worries, but she should not. To worry once he gets rid of it. And if she sees someone from whom blood comes out, and she knows this person and she is close to her, this indicates that God Almighty will grant her a lot of good in the very near future, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing blood bleeding from another person in a man’s dream The interpreters’ statements differed regarding the blood coming out in a dream, and there were many indications on it, including: If a man sees someone he knows in a dream and a lot of blood comes out of him, this means that the man will be exposed to many problems, worries and difficulties, but they will end soon, God willing, so there is no need to worry. God knows best. But if someone sees blood flowing from his hand, this is good news indicating that God will save him from many problems and grant him a lot of good and food. Blood bleeding from a person’s hand

title: Interpretation of a dream about fear, seeing fear in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Strange or known fear, flight for unmarried people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced people, from the jinn, crying from fear and more according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Fear in a dream Fear in a dream means safety and security from danger, and it is peace of mind, comfort and peace of mind, and fear expresses success. If it is called exams, it is awareness of goals, achieving safety, and fear of people. Love for them and a lot of love and fear of animals is an expression of the dreamer’s attitude. Strictness, seriousness, and fear in general in the interpretation of dreams are messages from the subconscious that indicate clarity of vision. And removing the fog from issues that await a decisive opinion or decision. Interpretation of fear in a dream. Fear in a dream is security according to the Almighty’s saying: “And He will make them safe after their fear.” Fear in a dream indicates repentance, because everyone who is afraid repents. A person’s fear in a dream indicates that you will be saved from his plots. And that you are safe from his temptation. Fear of animals in a dream according to the type of animal. The meaning of fear as in wakefulness. Fear of insects and reptiles, if there is no bite or pinch, is a sign of survival from the machinations of enemies. Fear of ghosts, safety and guidance. Fear of the survival of nature (sea And the mountain) and success. Fear to the point of panic means gaining grievances and committing sin. On the authority of Ali bin Abi Talib that he said: “The fearful person has no dream except what he loves, that is, his interpretation of joy and happiness.” In general, fear is one of the best dreams. Ibn Sirin says in his book on the interpretation of dreams in Interpretation of a dream about fear shows repentance, and everyone who is afraid repents, and it was said that whoever sees that he is afraid has attained fear and gained leadership. Al-Nabulsi interprets the dream about dreaming about fear: It is safe in a dream and can indicate repentance, so everyone who is afraid repents. Fear is safety in the dream, and fear is evidence. To repent, so everyone who is afraid will repent. Whoever sees) as if he is afraid, fleeing from fear, gains leadership. Whoever sees that he is waiting for fear, fights. Whoever sees) in a dream that he is afraid, then someone says to him: Do not be afraid, because you will not die, and you will not be able to live. So he becomes blind. Whoever dreams) to fear God and not be afraid, because the scary will happen yesterday and in our memory, and the scary is ugly and harmful. Fear and escaping in a dream. Fear of a person in a dream is evidence of a new friendship or love, and escaping from him in a dream is marriage, partnership, or marriage, and fear of snakes. Snakes are evidence of victory, and escaping from them is success, fear of monsters is evidence of the coming of fateful events, escaping from them is success, and fear of women is evidence of love. Love and fear of a mouse is pride, fear and escape from insects such as ants and cockroaches, fear and escape from scorpions is worship, and fear and escape from a policeman is success. Fear of a stranger in a dream. In the interpretation of dreams, the unknown person whom you do not know is yourself, in the correct sense, and your fear here translates your fear of yourself. . You are afraid in the dream because you cannot face your conscience, and you cannot speak with your mind or heart as a result of arrogance or pride. Fear of the jinn in your dream To dream of seeing jeans means that you have an energy superior to others and that you are afraid of jeans because you do not

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna hair in a dream and seeing henna applied to the hair

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dreaming about henna hair in a dream through the first dream website. See the opinions of interpreters in detail about seeing henna hair. The opinions of major scholars abound in interpreting dreams about henna hair, including Ibn Ghannam and al-Nabulsi. Then we discuss in detail some of their opinions on the various cases of the appearance of henna hair and its connotations. The interpretation of a dream about henna hair in a dream varies depending on the condition of the viewer, according to the details of his vision, and according to the time and place. Therefore, we will return to the most famous cases and interpretations of interpretation. Dreaming of henna hair, interpretation of applying henna to hair in a dream, interpretation of dreaming of applying henna to hair for single people, interpretation of dreaming of henna on married woman’s hair, and also interpretation of dreaming of henna on man’s hair, so follow us. Henna hair in a dream. Seeing henna hair in a dream indicates deeds. Good deeds and a lot of obedience. Interpretation of a dream about henna hair indicates hiding from the eyes of people and their purity. Seeing henna hair in a dream is a change to a better and good situation in the dreamer’s condition. Seeing henna in your hair in a dream symbolizes peace of mind and a feeling of security. Applying henna on the hair in a dream For a woman, it is evidence that joy will reach her, God willing. Seeing henna hair in a dream is evidence of the adornment of money and children. Seeing henna in the hair in a dream can be evidence of the equipment used in the fortune teller’s work. See also: Dyeing hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet. Applying henna on the feet. Hair in a dream: If you see yourself applying henna to gray hair in a dream, this indicates power and prestige. Seeing hair dyed black with henna indicates luxury and high status. Seeing henna applied to hair in a dream can symbolize whims and deception, and this interpretation depends on The dreamer’s condition. Applying henna on the hair in a dream for a pregnant woman can symbolize that she will face some difficulties and crises during pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of the dream of applying henna on the hair for the single woman. Interpretation of the dream of henna on the hair for the single woman, good news about the approach of their relationship and happiness. Interpretation of the dream of applying henna In the hair of an unmarried woman is a sign of the fulfillment of her desires, goals, and happiness. Seeing henna applied to the hair of an unmarried woman symbolizes her approaching marriage to a person she desires and is suitable for her. The interpretation of a dream about henna in the hair for a single woman may also indicate that she will get a job that she aspired to And you want it.Interpretation of a dream about henna in hair for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about henna in hair for a married woman Sometimes it may indicate that she has committed a sin and must repent.Interpretation of a dream about henna in hair for a married woman can also indicate that God will cover her in what she does.Applying henna to Hair in a dream for a married woman represents the death of sorrows and worries and the arrival of joy and comfort in the near future. Seeing a married woman putting henna on her head in a dream can be good news about the proximity of pregnancy and good offspring. Seeing henna in a woman’s hair

title: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin in interpreting a dream of a man chasing me for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a man chasing me for a single woman: Every girl in her normal life is afraid that someone will find her and follow her everywhere, and she is worried about his intentions towards her, and when she sees that in a dream, she has many clues and signs that she needs to recognize in order to interpret it. From this dream and through this article, we will reassure the viewer of what will bring him back, whether it is good, we bring him good news or bad, and we will give him advice that helps it not to happen, and we will present the largest number of issues and interpretations that concern him. By leading scholars and interpreters such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams of a man chasing me for a single woman. Seeing a dream about a man chasing a girl in a dream has many connotations and signs that can be identified through the following cases: A man is chasing me in a dream. An unmarried woman has a vision that indicates good luck and good news that She will get it in her life. If a single woman dreams of being chased, this symbolizes her ability to overcome the difficulties and problems she faces in her life. A person chasing an unmarried woman in a dream is a harbinger of the end of the disputes and conflicts that occurred between her and those close to her, and the return of the relationship better than before. Before.Interpretation of dreams of a man chasing me for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of a man chasing an unmarried woman in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations received from him:Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a man chasing an unmarried woman in a dream as the intense pressure and tension she is experiencing, which is reflected In her dreams. If an unmarried girl sees that someone she knows is following her in a dream, this symbolizes her close marriage to her lover and she will live a happy and stable life with him. An unmarried girl who sees someone following her in a dream without harming her is a sign of a lot of good money and abundance that You will get it in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams of a strange man chasing me for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about hunting a strange man in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a stranger is chasing her, this symbolizes To her wisdom and sobriety of mind in the balance of things, which makes her able to achieve her dreams regardless of the difficulties she faces. A stranger chasing an unmarried girl in a dream indicates his success and superiority over her peers on the academic or practical level. To see in a dream an unknown man that the girl does not know, and who Chasing her, this means happiness, comfort in life, and psychological comfort that she will enjoy in her life. I dreamed that a black man was chasing me. There are many interpretations of seeing a man chasing an unmarried woman, depending on the color of his skin, especially black ones: If an unmarried girl sees a dark-skinned man chasing her in her dream This symbolizes the difficulties and obstacles that she will face in her life, but she will be able to achieve her goals and ambitions. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that a man
